targets.expr:
1 - (
  avg_over_time(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (cluster_job_route:cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|write.*))", route=~"api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics"} offset 24h))[1h:])
  /
  avg_over_time(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (cluster_job_route:cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((distributor.*|cortex|mimir|write.*))", route=~"api_(v1|prom)_push|otlp_v1_metrics"}))[1h:])
)
 < ($latency_metrics * +Inf)

1 - (
  avg_over_time(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (cluster_job_route:cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+"} offset 24h))[1h:])
  /
  avg_over_time(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (cluster_job_route:cortex_request_duration_seconds_bucket:sum_rate{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"($namespace)/((query-frontend.*|cortex|mimir|read.*))", route=~"(prometheus|api_prom)_api_v1_.+"}))[1h:])
)
 < ($latency_metrics * +Inf)

list.description: Choose between showing latencies based on low precision classic or high precision native histogram metrics.
list.label: Latency metrics
list.name: latency_metrics
